game.name: PIPELINE RTX
game.shortDescription: PIPELINE RTX is a strategic puzzle game. The goal of the game is impossibly simple: you need to turn the various parts of the pipe into certain positions, so that in the end the water can, albeit with a large number of meanders, but pass through the water supply.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PIPELINE RTX is a strategic puzzle game. The goal of the game is impossibly simple: you need to turn the various parts of the pipe into certain positions, so that in the end the water can, albeit with a large number of meanders, but pass through the water supply.
